participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, with a love for dance and music from her youth.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s. i love new kids on the block.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Reflective and serene, deeply committed to personal growth and spirituality.
participant_2.background: i'm a buddhist. i live in alaska. i've not spoken in three months. i like meditation. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time.
